entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • On macOS `Process.PrivateMemorySize64` returns `0` #105665
  • .NET exception call stack not present when running as WASM #105664
  • [API Proposal]: Create a ToListOrEmpty<T> on System.Collections.Generic #105660
  • Cant set brotli sliding window length #105655
  • [API Proposal]: Overload ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull #105644
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'IS_ALIGNED(addr, byteSize)' during 'Emit code' #105624
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!varTypeIsMask(tree)' during 'Linear scan register alloc' #105623
    9.0.0
  • JIT: `AdvSimd.ShiftRightLogical(x, 0)` throws in debug but not in release #105621
    9.0.0
  • JIT: [arm32] Assertion failed 'baseRegUsed == reg2' during 'Generate code' #105620
    9.0.0
  • JIT: [arm32] Assertion failed 'varDsc->IsAlwaysAliveInMemory() || ((regSet.GetMaskVars() & regMask) == 0)' during 'Generate code' #105619
    9.0.0
  • JIT: [arm32] Assertion failed 'op2->TypeIs(TYP_I_IMPL)' during 'Morph - Global' #105618
    9.0.0
  • Applications requesting download of .NET 8 runtime even when it is installed #105615
  • Wrong revision in metadata for the `System.Data.SqlClient` version 4.8.6 (NuGet) #105613
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.PfxIterationCountTests_X509Certificate2.Import_IterationCountLimitExceeded_ThrowsInAllottedTime #105609
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/unittests/CollidedUnwind/CollidedUnwind.cmd #105608
  • [API Proposal]: Ability to get and set `ThreadLocal<T>.Value` in one method call #105607
    Future

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Implement IUtf8SpanParsable on Guid #105653
  • Standardize pattern for exposing advanced configuration for compression streams #42820
    9.0.0
  • Discrepancy in Windows built-in COM support between native and managed sides #56222
    9.0.0
  • Custom Marshaller codefix uses `nint` by default for unmanaged type with no indication that it should be changed #93315
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Wrong constant folding with -0.0f/-0.0d #105627
    9.0.0
  • Remove RequiresUnreferencedCode from DefaultValueAttribute #97842
    9.0.0
  • Debugger callstack failing when debugging with exceptions #105640
    9.0.0
  • IConfigureOptions should always be registered as transient #105600
    Future
  • Running .NET 6 single file binary with enabled compression on Apple M1 chip causes app to be "killed" #84066
    9.0.0
  • Receiving the following error message after upgrading to .NET SDK 6.0.200 on MacOS: Error: 'Failed to initialize CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x80004005' [/var/folders/4d/cbxjxphj73931v78kt_h2vr80000gn/T/il11v5iq.ifv/WorkerExtensions.csproj] #66856
    6.0.x
  • [wasm][aot] Test failure in System.Drawing.Primitives test suite #83394
    9.0.0
  • W^X concerns with C++/CLI #69691
    9.0.0
  • .NET Runtime Support for Swift Interop #93631
    9.0.0
  • Add tests for MSBuild tasks in `src/tasks` #79010
    9.0.0
  • Cannot download EMSDK in mono-wasm when running on Linux aarch64 #75589
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Review compiler options (again) #80217
    9.0.0
  • [mono] Implement new intrinsics in System/Numerics/Quaternion.cs #81961
    9.0.0
  • dotnet.timezones.blat & dotnet.timezones.blat.gz do not have the same contents on Publish (stale file in publish folder) #96033
    9.0.0
  • support for int256 integer data type; (note: extremely happy to see int128 in .net7.0 and moving forward!) #105650
  • running dotnet publish errors #100161
    9.0.0
  • [WebAssembly] AOT + WasmEnableExceptionHandling (false) - Does not start on iOS #95963
    9.0.0
  • Mono runtime fails to build for win-arm64 (and thus cross-compilers) #82496
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'node->OperIs(GT_LCL_ADDR) && lvaGetDesc(node->AsLclVarCommon())->IsHiddenBufferStructArg()' during 'Morph - Global' #105565
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] WBT `SatelliteAssembliesTests.CheckThatSatelliteAssembliesAreNotAOTed` failing #90458
    9.0.0
  • [Mono] Consider switching to C11 #90404
    9.0.0
  • [mono] ICU data file is not part of the bundle in library mode #95124
    9.0.0
  • Wasm.Build.Tests.Blazor.MiscTests.NativeBuild_WithDeployOnBuild_UsedByVS tests failing on restore for nuget package #104569
    9.0.0
  • [browser] addons.xpi ERROR System addon update list error SyntaxError: XMLHttpRequest.open: 'http://%(server)s/dummy-system-addons.xml' is not a valid URL. #104580
    9.0.0
  • Mono Wasm - System.Tests.ArrayTests.Copy_SZArray #105093
    Future
  • TrimmerRootAssembly results in incoherent trimming and hence integrity check error #96620
    9.0.0
  • [browser][mt] Jiterp Failed to patch opcode #97925
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: Interop/PInvoke/CriticalHandles/Test/Test/Test.cmd #103939
    9.0.0
  • publish a Microsoft.NET.WebAssembly.Webcil nuget to the transport feed #86597
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json Source Generation fails to compile when explicit property names and ignored property names collide. #99988
    10.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Loader.Tests.AssemblyLoadContextTest.Unload_CollectibleWithTwoAssemblies [FAIL] #100295
  • NetworkStream read large data string #105359
    9.0.0
  • Use CType on windows 11 #105614
  • [Perf] WASM SoD - 6% regression in dotnet.wasm.br file #57749
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Another potential bad codegen with shift by `Vector128` #105558
    9.0.0
  • Revisit code that updates loops before block removal #68844
    9.0.0
  • Test time out for Loader tests on osx arm64 in gcstress0x3 #104323
    9.0.0
  • unsigned right shift operator(>>>) cannot apply to two dynamic objects #99102
  • Private enumeration type can not be recognized when converted to dynamic #79045
  • Inconsistent CSharpCodeProvider.GenerateCodeFromCompileUnit output between net472 and net6/7/8 #95553
  • [NativeAOT] Local variables not available when debugging apps on Apple platforms #91955
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: baseservices/varargs/varargsupport/varargsupport.cmd #98911
    9.0.0
  • 18 regressions around string #97825
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 20 Regressions on 2/5/2024 1:05:09 PM #98046
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 7 Regressions on 2/25/2024 4:37:10 PM #99122
    9.0.0
  • Invalid profiler callbacks on exception handling since .NET 9 preview 3 #104300
    9.0.0
  • [browser][mt] Upgrade emscripten #75625
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix trim analysis for assignment to multiple refs in single method call #105663
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Enable some reflection emit tests on Mono #105662
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Use correct IL offset when reporting dataflow warnings for return statements #105661
    needs-area-label
  • Ensure that embedded broadcast is correctly checking for EVEX support before use #105659
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix race condition in nongcheap.cpp test #105658
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Rename `cdac_offsets` to `cdac_data` #105657
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Delete ROUND JIT helpers that are no longer used #105656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `Guid` #105654
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Don't run `fgUpdateFlowGraph` after reordering blocks if using RPO-based layout #105652
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove fallthrough constraint for `BBJ_SWITCH -> BBJ_COND` conversion #105651
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • AssemblyNameInfo.FullName should contain PublicKey #105649
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Fix flaky tests in WindowsServiceLifetimeTests #105648
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • TransferEncoding chunked testing only if it is last header value #105647
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono] Remove incorrect offsetof definition that shouldn't be needed #105646
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Set GCStressIncompatible on GenericContext test #105645
    GCStress
  • Update generated ILLink analyzer tests #105643
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • Fix check for types interesting to dataflow #105642
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Disable more flaky FSW tests for Windows #105638
    area-System.IO, 9.0.0
  • Workaround bug in EvtFormatMessage #105636
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog
  • Set the initial spin count unit to 10 for DATAS. #105634
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Adjust IP after an AV during an STEP with FEATURE_EMULATE_SINGLESTEP enabled #105633
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [NRBF] Fix XML docs #105632
    documentation, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • [Http/SslStress] Update linux container centos-stream9 #105631
    area-System.Net.Http
  • More IR validations in HIR #105630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove fallthrough restrictions in `Compiler::fgOptimizeBranch` #105625
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] move emsdk config file from runtime to emsdk #105612
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Store status code in exception for ProxyTunnelError #105610
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Update suppression reason for Assembly.GetType call #105577
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Ensure that negation of floating-point values is correctly handled #105629
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "Remove CONTEXT_XSTATE in FaultingExceptionFrame::UpdateRegDisplay" #105641
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Update Alpine version for libraries pipeline #105553
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add alternate system color experimental feature #105525
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add ZLib, Brotli compression options #105430
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Filter out fields of implicit byref params for retbuf optimization #105617
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Update tool build framework version #105639
    area-Infrastructure
  • [cdac] Add GetArrayData to Object contract, partially implement ISOSDacInterface::GetObjectData #105534
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add runtime config parameter to force ijwhost to load assemblies in an isolated context #105436
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 8.0.9
  • Update stubmgr.cpp #105611
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix bug in handling of duplicate properties in the fast-path source generator. #105628
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Fix ShiftRightLogical constant folding #105571
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Suppress the special VSD callsite nop marker for NAOT x86 ABI #105604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][interp] Attempt to interpret m2n wrapper if it is not found in aot image #105477
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.9

Updated

  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add ee_alloc_context (NativeAOT) #104851
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Randomized allocation sampling #104955
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [GC] Avoid OOM in large-allocation-only workloads #105521
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Simplified muxer fix #99576
    area-Host
  • SunOS process and thread support #105403
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2505022 #105050
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Haiku: Add Haiku support for CoreCLR/PAL #93907
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Enable CertificateCallbackThrowPropagates on Alpine #105489
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Update Preview/Experimental Attributes in Intrinsics #105579
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Update runtime's DevServer to match Blazor's updates in 9 #105554
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix MaxWorkingSet_GetNotStarted_ThrowsInvalidOperationException #105424
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-freebsd, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Error out when struct size is bigger than int.MaxValue #104393
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Enhance the bound generator concept to remove duplicate parameters and make it more pervasive throughout the system #105597
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Support listening to meters out-of-proc using a wildcard #105581
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] wasi:http + WasiHttpHandler #103752
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [WASI] bump WASI SDK 23 #105317
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Improve the performance of `BigInteger`.`{Max|Min}Magnitude`/`Abs` #105570
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [browser] Marshalling of resolved Tasks/promises is not resolved in JS/C# #105464
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Added SVE GetFfr, SetFfr, LoadVectorFirstFaulting, GatherVectorFirstFaulting #105595
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, Future
  • Add missing break statement #104286
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasi] Remove unused string parameter from mono_wasm_load_runtime #104608
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [browser] Remove check for user agent when attaching debugger #105559
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Issue 104700: Clarify error message for collection property with no getter #104861
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Rename module file to .mjs #105303
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi, os-browser
  • [WIP] DATAS tuning fixes #105545
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix SSPI ComputeIntegrityCheck with Sign level #105605
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Pass content length into limited streams as Int64 #105481
    area-System.Net
  • [browser][wbt] Fix `InvalidOperationException: There is no currently active test` #105561
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, os-browser
  • Use memfd_create when available #105178
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO, blocked, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Update IncrementingPollingCounter only on Timer thread #105548
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Automatically export '__managed__Main' when needed #105353
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add ee_alloc_context #104849
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-29
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Infrastructure for swift entry point demangling #2639

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] add some steps for wasi linux x64 #2605
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] support `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` on WASIp2 #2614
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet workload install wasm-tools` breaks build of ordinary csproj projects #42433
  • CORS policy.AllowAnyHeader() does not appear to work #42424

Closed

  • After updating .NET 8.0.304 SDK to .NET 8.0.400 SDK, running dotnet workload update failed to update workload manifests #42390

PullRequests

Created

  • Create a transport package for VS and VS authoring for analyzers #42451
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Try to bring back formerly flaky test #42450
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refactor artifacts size tests #42447
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #42438
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add analyzer redirecting proposal #42437
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Find baseline workload set in 8.0.100 folder #42435
    Servicing-consider, Area-Workloads
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #42428
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview7] Add false positive license scan to exclusions list #42434
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Enable package source mapping for workload * commands #42373
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Clean up STJ references Fixes #39902 #40645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable tab-completion for nuget package versions #42349
    Area-NuGet, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • Enable Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #41936
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Partner request
  • [8.0.1xx] No .deps.json for net472 Container task #42317
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Containers, 8.0.9
  • Remove the install of all runtimes 5.0 and below. #42327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-29
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Update first-class Span speclet to consider only structs #8321

Merged

  • Add open questions for LDM #8296
  • Add extension type erasure details #8305

Updated

  • Update first-class Span speclet #8312

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: SymbolDisplayFormat for fully-qualified metadata names and open generic types #74588
  • Add APIs to return all declared symbols in a variable declarator (fields, events, locals) #74586
  • [API Proposal]: `Concat` support for `IncrementalValuesProvider<T>` #74585

Closed

  • `ImmutableArray<object>.Empty` is not equal to `ImmutableArray<object> c = []` #71159
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [TEST] Testing PR tagging #74593
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update config for 17.12.P1 snap #74592
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce the number of sourcetexts fully recreated from the tree during brace completion enter #74591
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Disallow span conversions between spans which are not structs #74587
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types

Merged

  • Automatically tag PRs which may affect the C# extension. #74590
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix graying out of unused members in LSP #74589
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, 17.12 P1
  • Move tests to raw strings #74583
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.12 P1
  • Move 'generate XXX' code fixers down to code-style layer. #74567
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.12 P1
  • Expose inlay hints to Razor cohosting #74548
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.12 P1
  • Fix URI handling when comparing encoded and unencoded URIs #74544
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.12 P1
  • Make it possible to build/run tests on linux-arm64 #74536
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, 17.12 P1
  • EnC: Implement support for partial properties #74494
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Partial Properties, 17.12 P1
  • Address issues with VSIX item publishing projects and FUTDC #74470
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, 17.12 P1
  • Optimize codegen of `[]` for immutable arrays #74464
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.12 P1

Updated

  • Rename Suggestions: Fix getting of the context string, gracefully handle errors #74564
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix nested nullability of collection expressions in public APIs #74490
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix primary ctor param in static context #74580
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Erase extension types eagerly during translation of type symbols to Cci entities. #74576
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Avoid assert in emit layer when intercepted call implicitly captures receiver to temp #74509
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Parse `field` as a contextual keyword #73947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix symbol info in identifier name in object initializer #74582
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Improve error recovery for null coalescing assignment operator #74218
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid span conversion in delegate extension receiver #74044
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator (for string type) #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce Roslyn packages impact on UI thread #74501
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid optimizing away ref array access #74553
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: mvc #57066
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, fortunes, plaintext #57065
  • RequestStream’s `Flush` should not throw #57064
  • event handlers in layout .NET 8 Blazor #57063
  • [RedisCache] Add a IServiceProvider parameter in AddStackExchangeRedisOutputCache() #57059
  • [FromBody] attribute with an empty body request should set the default value of nullable value types to null. #57055
  • Perf regression: json_middleware, mvc #57053
  • SignalR Streaming Channel cancellation issue #57051

Closed

  • Perf improvement: fortunes_spring #57036
  • Perf regression: json, plaintext, plainTextWithFilter #57038
  • Perf regression: single_query #57047
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #57052
  • Introduce `IParameterBindingMetadata` to remove unbounded reflection in EndpointMetadataApiDescriptionProvider #56587
    9.0-preview7
  • Add ClientApplications to make it OAuth 2.0 compliant. #57040
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #57039

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify certificate rehash #57069
    area-commandlinetools
  • Fix up handling for awaitable IResults in ApiExplorer #57068
    area-mvc
  • Map all true schemas to empty object schemas in OpenAPI #57067
    area-web-frameworks
  • Optimize new use of Base64Url #57050
    area-networking

Merged

  • Add support for trusting dev certs on linux #56582
    area-networking, 9.0-rc1
  • Add comment to OpenApiDocumentProvider #57061
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks, 9.0-rc1
  • Update warning suppressions and cache ParameterInfo[] in generated code #56979
    area-minimal, 9.0-rc1

Updated

  • Parameters sourced from query, header, and route are never nullable #56957
    area-web-frameworks
  • Use BaseTypeInfo API to fix up polymorphic schemas #56908
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Introduce a logger provider that counts warnings and errors #54846
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun
  • Remove unsafe from PathNormalizer #56805
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Propagate trace parent to SignalR hub invocations #57049
    area-signalr
  • Add some HPackDecoderTests for empty header names and values #57032
    area-networking
  • [Blazor] Fix Identity UI accessibility issues #57033
    area-blazor, feature-identity-ui
  • Restrict permissions to the dev cert directory #56985
    area-commandlinetools
  • Microsoft.extensions.api description.server allow specifying environment #55836
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `9ff2450` to `5bcb2d7` #56999
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • dotnet-dump analyze does not work on M3 macOS #4779
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Updated

  • Enable new exception handling in .NET 9 SOS testing #4817
    DO NOT MERGE

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Opening a page with an undefined control template crashes on iOS only when not debugging #23903
  • NavigationPage and FlyoutPage both call OnNavigatedTo, so it is called twice #23902
  • Entry/Editor `Unfocused` event is not firing #23901
  • [iOS] Add a permanent wrapper around ImageButton so it works with our various behaviors #23897
    .NET 8 SR8
  • CollectionView inside ScrollView is more performant while scrolling? #23895
  • After updating the timezone, App is still showing the old date and time of the previously set time zone #23894
  • [iOS] Using long-press navigation on back button using shell does not update the shell's current page #23892
  • CollectionView first Item fail to refresh binded value using a IValueConverter (Windows) #23891
  • Error "Unable to activate Windows Store app" when Directory.Build.targets changes assembly name. #23889
  • [iOS][Maps] - .Net 9 Preview 5 app crashes when loading a page with a Map in Release #23888
  • The RealParent on Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Button has been Garbage Collected #23886
  • Error APPX1101: [UWP] Payload contains two or more files with the same destination path: Microsoft.Web.WebView2.Core.dll #23884
  • Call site reachable warning for enums when passing it to a safe function #23883
  • App sometimes crashes in Background on iOS Release #23882
  • Maui Blazor Hybrid: Cannot find page from Razor Class Library when IsTrimmable is set in Release mode, #23881

Closed

  • AppIcon not displayed for Android 7 #23178
    Backlog
  • MAUI Webview Process Lifecycle/Crash events #12860
    9.0-preview7
  • 'Microsoft.Maui.Platform.ContentView' does not have a constructor that takes one NativeHandle argument #23139

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix MauiEmbeddingPlatforms Targets #23905
  • Fix MauiEmbeddingPlatforms Targets #23904
  • Obsolete legacy measure calls #23899
  • Build the previous TFMs #23896
  • [net9.0] Merge `main` into `net9.0` #23890
  • [Windows] Register focus events for controls that can receive focus #23885
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, t/perf

Merged

  • Expose the embedding API #23887
  • Fire UpdateValue after all propertychange events #23746
  • dismiss the modal when IsAnimated is set to false #23879
    community ✨
  • Generate the Android 7 round app icon #23276
    area-single-project
  • Make IWindow.Content nullable #23785
    9.0-preview7
  • Added ProcessTerminated event to WebView #20059
    t/enhancement ☀️, area-controls-webview
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #23853
    area-infrastructure
  • [net9.0] Comment more failing tests for shell on net9 #23859
    area-testing, testing-flakiness, testing-green-ci, 9.0-preview7
  • Fixed a crash for the samples app [User interface concepts -> styles] #23852
    area-docs, area-xaml

Updated

  • [iOS] CollectionView - Use compositional layouts #23758
  • Implicitly set SupportedOSPlatformVersion #23857
    9.0-preview7
  • When swapping out ShellItems clear services #23863
    9.0-preview7
  • [Windows] Handle non-seekable streams in `PlatformImage.FromStream` (take 2) #23824
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Add `Window.Activate()` #23873
    community ✨, Under Consideration
  • [net9.0] Update preview7 packages #23809
    9.0-preview7
  • Fixed Switch Thumb and On Colors #20346
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-switch
  • Fix navigation stuck on iOS when pushing on hidden tab section in TabBar #22574
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • NuGet auditing package dependencies for security vulnerabilities #23860
  • [net9.0] Enable back the failing Shell tests #22830
    area-controls-shell, area-testing, testing-reenable
  • [Binding SG] Add inaccessible member access and not-static lambdas diagnostics #23671
  • Fix 19647 #20127
    area-xaml
  • [X] CSS specificity #19335
    area-xaml, stale
  • [X] don't expand types to Extension for x:Static #17276
    area-xaml, stale, Under Consideration
  • [X] deprecate fontImageExtension #23657
    area-fonts
  • Add mapper for IsSwipePagingEnabledProperty on Android #23129
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • Add support for running Appium tests with BrowserStack #18312
    area-testing, stale

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Optimize nested SELECT #34314
  • Temp id is not replaced with permanent value after SaveChanges #34309
  • When using Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite in a plug-in, if it is not introduced in the main project, but it is introduced in the plug-in project, an exception will be throwed. #34308

Closed

  • Cosmos: Optional One-To-Many relationship failing to explicit load (and improperly setting properties to null) #34112
    9.0.0-preview7
  • Support bitwise NOT on boolean values #34213
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.41.0 to 3.42.0 #34313
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Add back support for Cosmos nested dictionaries #34312

Merged

  • Use bitwise NOT on `BIT` SqlServer expressions #34303
  • Propagate `allowOptimizedExpansion` to `CASE` results #34304

Updated

  • Translate Order & OrderDescending #34282
  • Avoid duplicating complex expression in comparisons #34172
  • Prefer equality in boolean comparisons #34166
  • Transform aggregate functions over subqueries on SQL Server #34262
  • [WIP] New EF.Constant handling #34297
